chapter.title: Wiring server side components
chapter.para: By default, ErraiBus uses Google Guice to wire components. However, we plan on standardizing on JSR-330 Dependency Injection specification in the near future. When deploying services on the server-side, it is currently possible to obtain references to the MessageBus , RequestDispatcher , the ErraiServiceConfigurator , and ErraiService by declaring them as injection dependencies in Service classes, extension components, and session providers.
